case.title: ENGLAND BASED WHITE MALE SEEKS MIXED RACE AMERICAN (London)
case.text:
Hello,
I am a white male seeking a Mixed Race female for a long term relationship.One that makes us happy and enriches life.This can be achieved through being willing to make the effort,which is something I have no problem doing.Please be down to earth,genuine,honest,affectionate and easy going and willing to make equal effort.
PLEASE SEND SOME PHOTOS AND MORE THAN ONE AS ONE PHOTO DOES NOT PROPERLY INDICATE HOW SOMEONE LOOKS.
Thank you!
